main event: Two silver, medium-sized aircraft were observed flying in an inverted saucer configuration, passing each other at an altitude of around 5,000 feet.
interesting points: The objects were described as having an 'inverted saucer on top of each other' configuration.
The objects were observed for around 5 minutes before going out of sight.
The sighting was prompted by the sound of other aircraft in the area.
The objects were observed to be flying at a slow speed.
The sighting was initially reported to Air Defense Command, and then routed to various other military intelligence units.
sighted object: two silver, medium-sized aircraft in an inverted saucer configuration
